element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm applies a member function to the values in a raster layer and prepares it for fuzzy logic analysis. Member function is defined by a function type and four control point, as shown in the next picture.

element.name: TYPE
element.text: To choose from: * Linear: linear formulation to define the transitions between the values 0 and 1 on both sides of the graphic . * Sigmoidal. Sigmoidal formulation for the transitions * J- shaped.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: Raster layer with values between 0 and 1 obtained from applying the defined member function.
